item.title: The Going to the Beach Song - Drum Play Along
item.description:
For educational use. The Going to the Beach Song! by Scratch Garden. The original video may be found here: https://youtu.be/vEZkJhoUI5w. All I did was add a drum part so music students could play along.
I recommend having a soft drum cover the RED DRUM, and then have everybody hit on the BROWN DRUM. You could use djembe, conga, bongo, tambourine, shaker, BUCKET DRUM, etc. Just so the kids learn to keep a steady beat and enjoy drumming!
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.

item.title: Parry Gripp & BooneBum - Raining Tacos
item.description:
Itâ€™s Raining Tacos by Parry Gripp & BooneBum. For educational use. This playalong is designed for high drum, low drum, clapping, and shaker. That said, it could easily be adapted for bucket drum, body drum, drum line, drumset, etc. Original Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=npjF032TDDQ
Boomwhacker Version - https://youtu.be/y6xfNi5yiZA Ukulele / Guitar Version - https://youtu.be/kgFyUphEW_0
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.

item.title: Banana Song I'm A Banana - Drum Play Along
item.description:
EARWORM ALERT!
The Banana Song (Iâ€™m A Banana) by YouTuber Onision. For educational use. A silly song for kids to play in music class! Use whatever instruments you have; African drums, bucket drums, body drums, drumline, drumset, etc.
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.

item.title: "Weird Al" Yankovic - Yoda
item.description:
For educational use. Created with chord letter names and lyrics so any non-transposing instrument can play along.
Chords used C, D, E, A, B7, F#7, Am, B, G#7 (Ab7), C#m
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/BK5TDhyh7zk
Chord chart ("Tabs") available at: https://ukutabs.com/w/weird-al-yankovic-w/yoda/
************************************************
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. Motion video background from https://www.motionbolt.com
Check out the UkeStuff Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Radio Public, Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher. If you don't have a podcast app, please check out Radio Public for all your podcasts--they support podcasters financially.
You are invited to visit my ukulele blog/website, ukestuff.info (a free resource). Also on social media: Twitter (@UkeStuff) and Instagram (@ukestuff.info).
Want to make a donation towards this work? Visit https://www.buymeacoffee.com/ukestuff
Are you a teacher using ukulele in the classroom? Check out my video based method...effective, easy, and inexpensive! https://ukestuff.wordpress.com/the-video-ukulele-method/Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play alongs at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6
Check out the "merch": https://teespring.com/stores/ukestuff
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.

item.title: Milo Manheim - Like the Zombies Do
item.description:
For educational use. Do It Like the Zombies Do, from Disneyâ€™s Zombieâ€™s 2. The play along is for any high, low drum, shaker, and clapping. It could be a djembe with bass & slap, or tubanos, or bongos, or any combination of high & low drums. I will use it with African drum circle instruments in my classroom.
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
